title: Composite events

append.description: Adds the given widget(s) in the given order to the composite.
Adds all widgets in the given collection to the composite.

addchild.description: Fired when a child is added to this widget.

removechild.description: Fired when a child is removed from this widget. The *options* object contains the index of the removed child widget: `{index: number})`.
